title: Jolly Fields
blurb: Vast farming area with farming activities.
description: Jolly Fields is a vast farming area where characters indulge in farming activities and conjures a farming process – dig, sow, harvest with the emphasis on cooperative teamwork. There is never a lack of PLAYtime with ZOOMOOV characters as they find activities at the fields with long funnels, spinning wheels, wheelbarrows, sorting bins, harvesting trees and take some time to find farmer’s friends – bugs!, worms! (“Eeks!”) Often from afar, we would hear them say “Heave Ho and MOOV” in jolly echos. Jolly Fields is a seeds-filled play pit, equipped with tools for kids between 1-7 years old, to immerse in farming-themed dig and play activities. Built on the concept of D.I.G – Discover, Imaginative play and Gross motor skills, Jolly Fields targets the development of social and motor skills through PLAY.
Keyword_tag: farming activities, play pit, dig, imaginative play, gross motor skills, social skills, motor skills

title: Jolly Fields Adventure Park at Techplace II
blurb: Explore Jolly Fields, part of Zoomoov Adventure Park.
description: Jolly Fields, located within Zoomoov Adventure Park at Techplace II, offers a unique outdoor experience for families and children. This park features various play areas and attractions designed to engage kids in active and imaginative play. With a focus on creating a fun and safe environment, Jolly Fields provides a space where children can explore, learn, and enjoy the outdoors. The park includes interactive elements and activities suitable for a range of ages, making it an ideal destination for a family day out. Parents can relax while their children discover the joys of outdoor adventure in a thoughtfully designed setting. The park aims to promote physical activity and creativity in a natural environment.
